entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023
